topic.title: Configuration
topic.shortdesc: Configure the product for your environment.

section.title: Configuration File
section.p: The main configuration file is located at config/settings.yaml.
section.codeblock:
# Example configuration server: port: 8080 host: localhost
logging: level: INFO file: logs/app.log
database: url: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/mydb username: admin
